description.narrative: Community voices and action help to improve both quality and focus of health facilities to include child and family- friendly services, which contributes to Child Health, Child Health (Covid), Operations Support To Programme Delivery, Treatment Of Severe Acute Malnutrition, Water. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2021, pregnant women and new-borns, children and adolescents have equitable access to essential lifesaving health care services

participating-org.narrative: ASOCIACION CIVIL ALIANZA INTERNACIO CIELOS ABIERTOS
ASOCIACION CIVIL CENTRO DE INVESTIGACION SOCIAL

sector.narrative: Data, research, evaluation, evidence generation, synthesis, and use for SAM and nutrition in emergencies
Education and training in water supply and sanitation
HSS - Health systems procurement and supplies management
Water supply - institutions (schools, health care facilities, ECD centres)

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Community voices and action help to improve both quality and focus of health facilities to include child and family- friendly services

description.narrative: C4D started facilitating access to key information to communities in order to accelerate behaviour change in affected population. Expanding access to basic services and sharing information with the most at-risk population in prioritized states was the main objective. Immunization, with Polio Campagin, was the main focus on 2019. Community have been consulted, engaged and empowered using campaigns, social mobilization and behavior change activities. Through their voices, as part of accountability for affected population mechanism, their feedback has contributed to improve the quality of the health service strengthening the humanization of the health workers communication. | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:10/02/2020
